description: Run Intel MPI Benchmark â€“ PingPong between all node pairs in selected nodes. The latency and throughput will be reported. More refer to https://software.intel.com/en-us/imb-user-guide-pingpong-pingpongspecificsource-pingponganysource

parameters.name: Run with RDMA
parameters.description: Select YES if the Linux nodes are RDMA-capable, otherwise NO.

parameters.name: Latency threshold
parameters.description: Specify the threshold of latency to determine if test result is good. The value should be a number larger than 0.

parameters.name: Throughput threshold
parameters.description: Specify the threshold of throughput to determine if test result is good. The value should be a number larger than 0.

parameters.name: Packet size
parameters.description: Specify the size of transfer messages used in testing. Sizes from 2^0 to 2^22 bytes will be included in testing if the value is 0.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Select the way to run tasks.
